name: StarTech.com PCI1394_4 4 Port IEEE 1394 FireWire PCI Card

reviews.name: StarTech.com PCI1394_4 4 Port IEEE 1394 FireWire PCI Card
reviews.reviewText: This firewire product offers more connection options then most for less money.
reviews.title: Very good firewire product

reviews.name: StarTech.com PCI1394_4 4 Port IEEE 1394 FireWire PCI Card
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to connect my Sony HandyCam DVC to my computer. My computer didn't have a firewire port which is what you need to connect a Sony Digital Video Camcorder to the computer. This card is for older PCI only internal connections. This card came with a firewire 4 pin to 6 pin cable. Which is what I needed as well.
reviews.title: Comes with video editing / capture software

reviews.name: StarTech.com PCI1394_4 4 Port IEEE 1394 FireWire PCI Card
reviews.reviewText: great for Apple G3 Beige Revision 1 Power Mac Desktop 266Mhz to bkup to firewire hard drive.(this Computer did not come with anything but SCSI )
reviews.title: great for Apple G3 Beige Revision 1 Power Mac
